attributes.additional_details: Ive just finished working in the gas industry for over 10years previously just come back to the U.K. from living in America, I’ve seen the registration fracking has caused in Texas and it isn’t pretty, damaging Local communities and the environment
attributes.background: Fracking isnt the way forward to our energy supply we would be moving backwards and harming the environment, we need to invest more in green renewable energy up to the 21st century standards
